caption: A man and a woman were standing on the street, having a conversation. The man handed a bag to the woman, and they embraced tightly, with the woman shedding tears. Above them, three people were watching a play. A couple was playing in the park. Four women were sitting on the steps, leaning on each other. A group of people sat on a couch in a lavishly decorated room. A woman entered an office, then went to a room filled with glass cups. A man and a woman were chatting under a chandelier. A woman entered what seemed to be the office of a chairman.

global.question: Do more than 5 people appear in the video?
When does it happen in the video, ancient age, modern age or future?
Does it happen during day or night?
Are there more male characters or female characters?

breakpoint.question: What is the pants color of the man?
